post:
Hello,

New special LET promo-package from [NQhost](http://nqhost.com). 
Xen-based Linux VPS, three locations: Russia/USA/Germany.

Pricing - $6/month, [direct link to order](https://crm.nqhost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=110)

RAM - 512MB RAM

Disk Space - 10GB of RAID-10 storage

Bandwidth Transfer - Unmetered Transfer / Port Speed - 100Mbit shared port / vCPU(s) - 2 CPU (~2.4-3.30 Ghz) / IPv4 & IPv6 - One IPv4 address / Virtualization Type/Platform - Xen / Virtualization Control Panel - SolusVM

Payment Methods - credit cards, PayPal, Skrill (moneybookers), WebMoney, Yandex.Money

The promo has the limit of 20 activations.

Test IP's: USA - 198.15.77.202; Russia - 109.68.191.1; Germany - 178.63.9.1

Thank you.
